title: Creamy chicken curry pasta
ingredients: ['500g pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, minced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '4 chicken breast fillets, cubed', '300ml double cream', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '3 tablespoons tomato chutney', 'salt salt to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped parsley or 1 teaspoon dried parsley']
